list-item.label: dat
list-item.p: A single directory name, or a list of NetCDF files. If a directory name is given, all NetCDF files in the directory will be used. The pairing of temperature and precipitation NetCDF files in the directory relies on the CMIP5 file naming conventions. Other naming conventions are not currently supported.

list-item.label: tvarname
list-item.p: A string with the name of the temperature variable in the temperature NetCDF.

list-item.label: tlatvar
list-item.p: A string with the name of the latitude coordinate variable in the temperature NetCDF files. Normally this is simply ‘lat’.

list-item.label: tlonvar
list-item.p: A string with the name of the longitude coordinate variable in the temperature NetCDF files. Normally this is simply ‘lon’.

list-item.label: tvarconvert_fcn
list-item.p: The function used to transform the temperature variable prior to training so that it has support on (−∞, ∞). Defaults to NULL, as temperature is effectively already supported on this range.

list-item.label: pvarname
list-item.p: A string with the name of the temperature variable in the precipitation NetCDF.

list-item.label: platvar
list-item.p: A string with the name of the latitude coordinate variable in the precipitation NetCDF files. Normally this is simply ‘lat’.

list-item.label: plonvar
list-item.p: A string with the name of the longitude coordinate variable in the precipitation NetCDF files. Normally this is simply ‘lon’.

list-item.label: pvarconvert_fcn
list-item.p: The function used to transform the precipitation variable prior to training so that it has support on (−∞, ∞). Defaults to log.
